description: Jake Peralta, a talented but carefree detective, and his colleagues meet their new captain -- Ray Holt, a tightly wound man determined to improve the dysfunctional 99th precinct.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: Jake thinks the graffiti case he's investigating is below him until he discovers the culprit is the deputy commissioner's son; Gina's psychic friend gets under Charles's skin.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: When Jake starts accumulating unsolved cases, the other detectives worry his losing streak will rub off on them; Amy, Rosa and Gina run a program for at-risk youth; Boyle helps Sgt. Jeffords with a case.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: Jake vows to get revenge when a detective from Special Crimes takes over his nearly solved murder case; Captain Holt and Gina help Terry.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: Jake hits on an attractive medical examiner at a crime scene and holds up the autopsy report; Amy's purse-snatching case is stalled when the sketch artist is out sick.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: Unhappy Amy must wear a costume to go on patrol with Charles; Jake bets Holt he can steal his Medal of Valor.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: Jake's co-workers help him find evidence to keep a suspect he arrested in custody; Gina and Rosa have a pie contest; Holt helps Terry look better to his in-laws.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: Jake gets to spend the day with his hero, a former crime reporter; Terry and Charles work with Rosa on how she comes across on the witness stand.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: When Sal's Pizza burns down, Jake goes out of his way to disprove the fire marshal's assumption that the owner set the fire; a computer virus exposes the precinct members' Internet browser histories.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: When Holt and Jake must leave Amy's Thanksgiving dinner to catch a perp, Boyle steps in to save the day.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: When Holt starts getting death threats, Jake takes charge of his security; Amy tries to get a precinct Christmas photo; Terry gets his mojo back.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: Jake and Amy settle their ongoing bet about who can make more arrests; Charles reveals what he really thinks about his colleagues while under the influence of pain medication.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: One of Rosa's perps has information on a car thief Jake has been after for years; the station struggles to accommodate Charles' needs; Holt tries to find two puppies a home.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: Terry takes cues from Jake while on his first task back in the field; Amy and Rosa help solve a case at Gina's apartment.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: While investigating a string of hotel robberies, Jake learns Amy may go work with the major crimes unit; Holt and Jeffords endeavor to make the precinct more efficient.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: The officers go to Holt's house to celebrate his birthday but end up making a poor impression on his husband.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: Jake intervenes in Detective Boyle's relationship; Rosa and Amy contend with a citizen who is a costumed crime-fighter; Capt. Holt has a new opponent.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: Jake's fate is in Gina's hands as his crushing debt threatens to put him on the streets; Holt and Jeffords hold performance reviews; Rosa and Boyle have a run-in with an other officer.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: All the regional precincts compete in a mandatory training course; Amy runs into an officer she used to date; Rosa is mad when Charles doesn't invite her to his wedding.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: As Charles' best man, Jake must be involved with important wedding decisions including cake tasting and floral arrangements; Gina, Terry and Amy start an extreme diet; Rosa has to make a sincere apology.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: During a weekend off, Jake decides to tackle a cold case that everyone thinks is unsolvable; Amy plans a trip with Teddy (Kyle Bornheimer); Rosa and Gina share a secret with Charles.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine

description: When Jake's investigation into a philanthropic leader is shut down, he turns to Amy and reluctant Capt. Holt for help; premarital problems leave Charles devastated.
title: brooklyn-nine-nine
